title: How Maxwell Ryan Won With Millennials
description: It's fitting that Maxwell Ryan was a teacher for seven years prior to  founding Apartment Therapy. He’s now teaching readers—20 million of them—how to live beautifully and happily. By featuring homes that are “juicy, lived-in, and accessible,” he appeals to the “broad middle”—a lot of people with a little to spend—and is the go-to for Millennials who love decorating. This episode is sponsored by Fuigo.
author: info@editoratlarge.com (Business of Home)
